department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: leather case in various shades of brown; two circular designs in layered sections on bottom front; woven diamond pattern on front flap; two braided loops on right and left at the top; inner flap at the top with dark brown linear pattern; two long, loose flaps of leather on the inside of the case on the right and left; cream-colored inner lining; thin leather strap on front; small braided loop on the outer side on bottom center
title: Case for Islamic manuscript
